attributes.action: Time to ban alcohol from Parliament and all places of government
attributes.additional_details: With recent allegations of behavioural and misconduct issues relating to politicians with the mix of alcohol and bars with in government settings to remove the temptation and ban the consumption of alcohol which should not be consumed within parliament or any government settings
attributes.background: We want the government to ban the sale of alcohol with in the Palace of Westminster but all government establishments whether National, regional and local

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Ban alcohol in the Houses of Parliament and all government buildings.: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604101
